models.categories: Four skill categories representing different dimensions of product work.

skills.title: Problem Framing & Decision Loops
skills.description:
I begin with behaviour, constraints, and outcomes — not features.
Map the decision path → remove friction → ship in tight learning cycles.
**Rivo (Mortgage Ops)**: workflow redesign across review and triage led to **~30% lower effort** per case and higher case-throughput per specialist.

skills.title: Roadmapping & Prioritisation
skills.description:
Decisions are guided by impact on activation, retention, and time-to-decision, rather than feature volume.
At **Attentive OS**, the proposal-engine iterations were shaped around workflow improvement, contributing to a **~25% reduction** in manual effort across operations.

skills.title: 0→1 & Continuous Improvement
skills.description:
Move ideas from insight → first usable version → measured adoption, without over-engineering.
Lightweight V1s for internal tools were shipped early, then strengthened through usage-driven learning.

skills.title: Clarity in thinking, speed in execution, discipline in measurement.
Workflow-First AI Integration
skills.description:
AI is used where it reduces cognitive load, removes repetitive steps, or improves decision quality.
**TalentKnct (RAG Matching Engine)**: embeddings-based matching with feedback loops supported **10+ internship placements**, with improvements driven by real-world usage signals.

skills.title: Human-in-the-Loop Decision Systems
skills.description:
AI accelerates judgment — humans own outcomes.
Design centres on trust, interpretability, and correction loops.

skills.title: Impact-Driven Evaluation
skills.description: Success is measured through relevance, engagement, and task-completion lift, not vanity metrics.

skills.title: The goal isn't to "add AI" — it's to make workflows lighter, faster, and more accurate.
Backend Foundations — Python · Django · APIs
skills.description:
Comfortable working close to systems and data flows to make practical, grounded product decisions.
**HealthifyMe Core Journeys**: caching and query optimisation delivered **4× faster responses** and **~10% lower cloud costs**, while improving reliability at scale.

skills.title: Performance as a Product Lever
skills.description: Latency, throughput, and reliability treated as experience and business value, not just engineering concerns.

skills.title: System Design Awareness
skills.description: Prefer simple, predictable architectures that scale without unnecessary complexity.

skills.title: I connect product intent with engineering reality — so what we design is buildable, efficient, and durable.
User Insight & Behaviour Understanding
skills.description:
Conversations, journey mapping, and workflow observation to surface true friction, not assumed problems.
**Rivo discovery work** revealed duplicate-entry and handoff bottlenecks that shaped the workflow redesign.

skills.title: Structured Communication & Alignment
skills.description: Share reasoning clearly → teams stay aligned → execution moves faster.

skills.title: Ownership & Calm Delivery
skills.description: Take problems end-to-end, operate with intention, and stay outcome-oriented over output-oriented.

skills.title: My strength: systems thinking + execution speed + measurable outcomes — across product, AI, and engineering.
